name.es: Faja Extra Reloj de Arena / Ivania

description.en: Hourglass shaper with 9 steel boning rods for maximum waist definition. Features natural butt lift, upper and lower abdominal compression, and maximum back coverage. Ideal for daily wear, post-surgical, and postpartum use.

care: Lavar a mano con agua fria. No usar secadora. No usar blanqueador.

description.en: After shower, apply a liberal amount to your desired area. Massage gently, allow the skin to absorb it. You'll feel the heat after 15 minutes. Twice a day, with continuous use for 2 to 3 months for best results.
description.es: Despues de la ducha, aplicar generosamente en el area deseada. Masajear suavemente, permitir que la piel absorba. Sentiras el calor despues de 15 minutos. Dos veces al dia, con uso continuo de 2 a 3 meses para mejores resultados.

description.en: Rosemary oil hair mask that hydrates and repairs damaged hair. Strengthens roots, reduces hair loss, stimulates growth, reduces dandruff and scalp irritation. Suitable for all hair types, recommended for weekly use.
description.es: Mascarilla capilar de aceite de romero que hidrata y repara el cabello danado. Fortalece raices, reduce caida del cabello, estimula el crecimiento, reduce caspa e irritacion del cuero cabelludo. Apta para todo tipo de cabello, uso semanal recomendado.

description.en: Rosemary-based scalp exfoliating scrub that eliminates dead scalp cells and promotes healthy hair growth. Reduces dandruff, strengthens roots, stimulates growth, and improves blood circulation. For all hair types, use 1-2 times weekly.
description.es: Scrub de exfoliacion capilar a base de romero que elimina celulas muertas del cuero cabelludo y promueve el crecimiento saludable del cabello. Reduce caspa, fortalece raices, estimula crecimiento y mejora la circulacion. Para todo tipo de cabello, usar 1-2 veces por semana.

name.en: Rosemary Mint Oil for Longer Hair

description.en: Natural rosemary oil that stimulates hair growth and strengthens roots. Applied directly to scalp with gentle massage to enhance blood circulation. Also strengthens nails and skin. Free from chemicals and safe for regular use.

description.en: Discover radiant, healthy hair with our hair care set. Hydrating shampoo and repairing conditioner formulated with rosemary, mint, and natural oils to nourish and protect hair from roots to tips.

shortDescription.en: Rosemary & mint shampoo and conditioner set for healthy hair.
